channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sloping, uneven, difficult to walk along for the disabled and unsteady, 15th January
item.description:
Pavement from beginning of road to end of Selkirk Close. The whole length of pavement is difficult- uneven, sloping, mounded.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-12, Selkirk Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping and waste in hedgerow, 15th January
item.description:
Unbelievable amount of waste - plastics bottles, glass bottles, tin cans, aluminium cans, paper, plastics, bin bags full of waste in the hedgerow behind the A417 lay-by on the northbound side of the carriageway and on the grass verge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermine Way, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gully outside 14 Sydenham Road North, 14th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Sydenham Road North, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Significant waste along both carriageways., 14th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Litter, 14th January
item.description:
Please clear up the large amount of litter strewn all along the A40 towards Cheltenham it’s awful to drive past this every day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Fly tipping & rubbish, 14th January
item.description:
The A40 is so badly littered & fly tipped (trampoline) that it poses a danger to vehicles, both the distraction of such epic proportions and being blown onto the carriageway in both directions.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes Bayshill Road, 14th January
item.description:
Bayshill Road is in desperate need of resurfacing, especially the stretch between Parabola Road and St George's Road. There are multiple potholes. This is a really useful cycle route from north to south, avoiding the town centre, but dodging potholes makes it challenging
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes deep enough to make serious damage to suspension or three and wheels, 14th January
item.description:
All potholes are right when you turn left from Eveshem road towards meadow way in the very beginning of the street Been there for ages and after the heavy rains they just getting worse and deeper

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meadoway, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branch fell and just missed passers by on the pavement, 14th January
item.description:
Outside property large tree on highway needs pollarding All of the trees do after Church road end upto Old Bath Road. The large birds jump around the trees and the branches fall as well as high winds causing this large branch to fall. This has been an ongoing issue for years. The trees will be a lot healthier if they were cut back. The street lights can’t light the pavements up in parts because the trees are so large.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 216a, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Raised pavement due to trees roots in a private garden, 14th January
item.description:
Just walking into Pilley lane from Leckhampton Road. You have already repaired the corner so thank you. It’s just a shame that the workmen didn’t report that the pavement is quite bad all around that area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 174, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
